dependencies.description:
dogpile.cache is a Python caching API which provides a generic interface
to caching backends of any variety.
dependencies.name: py-dogpile-cache

dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.
dependencies.name: py-jsonschema

dependencies.description:
This Python package is a high-level wrapper for Kerberos (GSSAPI)
operations. The goal is to avoid having to build a module that wraps the
entire Kerberos.framework, and instead offer a limited set of functions
that do what is needed for client/server Kerberos authentication based
on <https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4559.txt>.
dependencies.name: py-kerberos

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
This Python package is a high-level wrapper for Kerberos (GSSAPI)
operations.
dependencies.name: py-pykerberos

dependencies.description:
A python wrapper for libmagic. This project is named python-magic but
imports as the module name "magic".
dependencies.name: py-python-magic

dependencies.description: This is a python client for the Swift API.
dependencies.name: py-python-swiftclient

dependencies.description: An authentication handler for using Kerberos with Python Requests.
dependencies.name: py-requests-kerberos

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.
dependencies.name: py-urllib3

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

variants.description: Enable bash tab completion for argparse
variants.name: argcomplete

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Enable file type identification using libmagic
variants.name: dumper
